messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kelly's move
messages.msgSnippet: YES.. I do remember now you asking about the area and land for sale, ect.. Well, Im about an hour and half from that area..  Yol is in Asheville.... I met a
messages.messageBody:
YES.. I do remember now you asking about the area and land for sale, ect..
Well, Im about an hour and half from that area.. Yol is in Asheville.... I
met a lady today at the science center from Boone.. Thats a nice college town
too... ( my sister went to ASU) Keep us updated! I would love to show you
around the mtns when you get moved

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
